name: @getwax/circuits
description: Simple ZKP verification for ERC-4337. Based on circuits in https://github.com/privacy-scaling-explorations/zkp-app-boilerplate
author: jacque006

scripts.precompile: scripts/prerequisites.sh && mkdir -p zk/circuits zk/zkeys zk/vkeys zk/verifiers
scripts.compile: for circuit in circuits/*.circom; do circom $circuit --r1cs --sym --wasm -o zk/circuits;done && tsc
scripts.export:sample-zkey: for circuit in zk/circuits/*.r1cs; do snarkjs groth16 setup $circuit powersOfTau28_hez_final_15.ptau zk/zkeys/$(basename -- $circuit .r1cs).zkey;done
scripts.export:vkey: for zkey in zk/zkeys/*.zkey; do snarkjs zkey export verificationkey $zkey zk/vkeys/$(basename -- $zkey .zkey).json;done
scripts.export:verifier: for zkey in zk/zkeys/*.zkey; do snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier $zkey zk/verifiers/$(basename -- $zkey .zkey | perl -nE 'say ucfirst').sol;done
scripts.build: yarn compile && yarn export:sample-zkey && yarn export:vkey && yarn export:verifier
